sentences: Kõik meessoost sõbrad kogunevad peigmehe sõprade õhtuks.
Enne pulmi korraldatakse tihti poissmehe ja tema meessoost sõprade kokutulek.
context: The word 'sõprade' is the plural genitive form of 'sõber' (friend). In this context, it refers to 'friends' in the phrase describing a bachelor party or stag night - an event held for the groom and his male friends before the wedding day. This type of gathering is traditionally called a 'poissmehe sõprade pidu' (groom's friends' party) or simply 'sõprade õhtu' (friends' evening).
